content.en: Algorithmic Mechatronics: Algorithms are predicted to play a significant role in the future of mechatronics design methodology and systems. The development of intelligent systems paradigms, such as fuzzy logic, artificial neural networks, and genetic algorithms, has become linked with mechatronics, making it a universally accepted and important methodology. Algorithms are also attributed to the designing principles and methods of mechatronic device and product systems, and they greatly enhance the operational capabilities and performance specifications of mechatronics products.
content.da: Algoritmisk Mekatronik: Algoritmer forventes at spille en betydelig rolle i fremtiden for mekatronisk designmetodik og systemer. Udviklingen af intelligente systemparadigmer, såsom fuzzy logic, kunstige neurale netværk og genetiske algoritmer, er blevet forbundet med mekatronik, hvilket gør det til en universelt accepteret og vigtig metodik. Algoritmer tilskrives også designprincipperne og metoderne for mekatroniske enheds- og produktsystemer, og de forbedrer i høj grad de operationelle kapaciteter og ydelsesspecifikationer for mekatronikprodukter.
